#!/bin/bash
# Docker-Kompatible Database Backup Tool Installation - SYNTAX ERROR BEHOBEN

set -e

declare -r DIR="/mnt/server"
declare -r APP_DIR="${DIR}/db-backup-tool"

# Fest definiertes Repository
REPO_URL="https://github.com/brandy2307/db-backup-tool.git"
REPO_BRANCH="main"

echo "================================================="
echo "DB BACKUP TOOL INSTALLATION (DOCKER COMPATIBLE)"
echo "================================================="
echo "Repository: ${REPO_URL}"
echo "Branch: ${REPO_BRANCH}"
echo "Target: ${APP_DIR}"
echo "Features: Docker-Fixed SSL + Enhanced Security"
echo "================================================="

# System Dependencies
echo "[1/8] Installing system dependencies..."
apt update
apt install -y wget curl gnupg2 software-properties-common git openssl ca-certificates lsb-release

# Node.js
echo "[2/8] Installing Node.js 18..."
curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_18.x | bash -
apt install -y nodejs

# Database Tools
echo "[3/8] Installing database tools..."
apt install -y mysql-client || echo "MySQL client optional"
apt install -y postgresql-client || echo "PostgreSQL client optional"
apt install -y mongodb-database-tools || echo "MongoDB tools optional"

# SSL Tools
echo "[4/8] Installing SSL tools..."
apt install -y certbot || echo "Certbot installation failed - will use self-signed"
apt install -y openssl ca-certificates

# Git Setup
echo "[5/8] Configuring Git..."
git config --global init.defaultBranch main
git config --global user.name "DB Backup Tool"
git config --global user.email "backup@localhost"

# Repository Clone
echo "[6/8] Cloning repository..."
cd "${DIR}"
rm -rf "${APP_DIR}" 2>/dev/null || true
git clone -b "${REPO_BRANCH}" "${REPO_URL}" "${APP_DIR}"
cd "${APP_DIR}"

# Dependencies
echo "[7/8] Installing dependencies..."
npm cache clean --force
npm install --production --no-audit --no-fund

# Directory Setup
echo "Creating directories..."
mkdir -p backups logs config public ssl
chmod 700 ssl
chmod 755 backups logs config public

# SSL Setup
echo "[8/8] Setting up SSL..."
if [ "${SSL_SETUP_ON_START:-true}" = "true" ] && [ "${REQUIRE_HTTPS:-false}" = "true" ]; then
    echo "🔐 SSL-Setup wird vorbereitet..."
    
    export SSL_DOMAIN="${SSL_DOMAIN:-localhost}"
    export SSL_METHOD="${SSL_METHOD:-selfsigned}"
    export SSL_KEY_SIZE="${SSL_KEY_SIZE:-4096}"
    export SSL_CERT_VALIDITY="${SSL_CERT_VALIDITY:-365}"
    
    # Einfaches SSL-Setup Script erstellen
    cat > ./ssl-setup.sh << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
set -e

SSL_DOMAIN="${SSL_DOMAIN:-localhost}"
SSL_METHOD="${SSL_METHOD:-selfsigned}"
SSL_KEY_SIZE="${SSL_KEY_SIZE:-4096}"
SSL_CERT_VALIDITY="${SSL_CERT_VALIDITY:-365}"

echo "🔐 SSL-Setup für ${SSL_DOMAIN} (Methode: ${SSL_METHOD})"

mkdir -p ssl
chmod 700 ssl

if [ "${SSL_METHOD}" = "selfsigned" ]; then
    echo "🔄 Erstelle Self-Signed Zertifikat..."
    
    # Enhanced OpenSSL Config für Browser-Kompatibilität
    cat > ssl/openssl.cnf << 'SSLCONF'
[req]
distinguished_name = req_distinguished_name
req_extensions = v3_req
prompt = no
x509_extensions = v3_ca

[req_distinguished_name]
C = DE
ST = NRW
L = Docker
O = DB Backup Tool
CN = DOMAIN_PLACEHOLDER

[v3_req]
basicConstraints = CA:FALSE
keyUsage = nonRepudiation, digitalSignature, keyEncipherment
extendedKeyUsage = serverAuth, clientAuth
subjectAltName = @alt_names

[v3_ca]
basicConstraints = CA:FALSE
keyUsage = nonRepudiation, digitalSignature, keyEncipherment
extendedKeyUsage = serverAuth, clientAuth
subjectAltName = @alt_names

[alt_names]
DNS.1 = DOMAIN_PLACEHOLDER
DNS.2 = localhost
IP.1 = 127.0.0.1
IP.2 = ::1
SSLCONF
    
    # Domain in Config einsetzen
    sed -i "s/DOMAIN_PLACEHOLDER/${SSL_DOMAIN}/g" ssl/openssl.cnf
    
    # Zertifikat erstellen mit Enhanced KeyUsage
    openssl req -x509 -newkey rsa:${SSL_KEY_SIZE} \
        -keyout ssl/privkey.pem \
        -out ssl/fullchain.pem \
        -days ${SSL_CERT_VALIDITY} \
        -nodes \
        -config ssl/openssl.cnf \
        -extensions v3_ca
    
    rm -f ssl/openssl.cnf
    
    # Validierung
    if openssl x509 -in ssl/fullchain.pem -text -noout | grep -q "digitalSignature"; then
        echo "✅ Enhanced SSL-Zertifikat mit korrekter KeyUsage erstellt"
        echo "🌐 Browser-Kompatibilität: ERR_SSL_KEY_USAGE_INCOMPATIBLE behoben"
    else
        echo "⚠️ KeyUsage möglicherweise nicht optimal"
    fi
else
    echo "⚠️ SSL-Methode ${SSL_METHOD} - verwende Self-Signed Fallback"
    SSL_METHOD="selfsigned"
    exec "$0"
fi

# Berechtigungen setzen
chmod 644 ssl/fullchain.pem 2>/dev/null || true
chmod 600 ssl/privkey.pem 2>/dev/null || true

# Validierung
if openssl x509 -in ssl/fullchain.pem -text -noout >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "✅ SSL-Zertifikat erfolgreich validiert"
    echo "📋 Zertifikat-Details:"
    openssl x509 -in ssl/fullchain.pem -subject -dates -noout 2>/dev/null || echo "Details nicht verfügbar"
else
    echo "❌ SSL-Zertifikat ungültig"
    exit 1
fi

echo "🎉 SSL-Setup abgeschlossen!"
EOF
    
    chmod +x ./ssl-setup.sh
    
    # SSL-Setup ausführen
    echo "🔄 Führe SSL-Setup aus..."
    if ./ssl-setup.sh; then
        echo "✅ SSL-Setup erfolgreich"
        if [ -f "ssl/fullchain.pem" ] && [ -f "ssl/privkey.pem" ]; then
            echo "🔐 HTTPS-Zertifikate erstellt"
            echo "🌐 Enhanced Browser-Kompatibilität aktiviert"
        fi
    else
        echo "⚠️ SSL-Setup fehlgeschlagen - HTTP Fallback aktiv"
    fi
else
    echo "ℹ️ SSL-Setup übersprungen (deaktiviert)"
fi

# Finale Berechtigungen
chmod 755 .
chmod 644 *.json *.js *.md 2>/dev/null || true
chmod +x *.sh 2>/dev/null || true

# Grundlegende Dateien erstellen
touch logs/security.log
echo "[]" > backups/schedules.json 2>/dev/null || true
echo "* text=auto" > .gitattributes 2>/dev/null || true

# Validierung
echo "Validiere Installation..."
if node -e "JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('package.json', 'utf8'))" 2>/dev/null; then
    echo "✅ package.json gültig"
else
    echo "❌ package.json ungültig"
    exit 1
fi

echo "================================================="
echo "🎉 INSTALLATION ERFOLGREICH ABGESCHLOSSEN!"
echo "================================================="
echo "✅ Repository: ${REPO_URL}"
echo "✅ Branch: ${REPO_BRANCH}"
echo "✅ Node.js: $(node --version 2>/dev/null || echo 'Unknown')"
echo "✅ NPM: $(npm --version 2>/dev/null || echo 'Unknown')"
echo "✅ Docker-Optimiert: Snap-frei"
echo "✅ Enhanced SSL: Browser-Kompatibilität verbessert"
echo "✅ Security Features: 2FA, CAPTCHA, Rate Limiting"
echo "✅ Database Support: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB"
echo "✅ Git Backup: Unterstützt"
echo "✅ Auto-Update: Aktiviert"

if [ -f "ssl/fullchain.pem" ] && [ -f "ssl/privkey.pem" ]; then
    echo "🔐 SSL Status: Zertifikate verfügbar"
    echo "🌐 Browser Fix: ERR_SSL_KEY_USAGE_INCOMPATIBLE behoben"
else
    echo "ℹ️ SSL Status: Wird beim ersten Start erstellt"
fi

echo "================================================="
echo "🚀 SERVER BEREIT ZUM STARTEN!"
echo "🔧 Konfiguration über Pterodactyl Umgebungsvariablen"
echo "📝 Standard Login: admin / admin123 (bitte ändern!)"
echo "================================================="
